docs.lead_paragraph: Not even an ostrich, so far as we know, ever thought of hiding his feet in the sand; but just that may be the impulse of more than one beach beauty when first she brings her Winter feet into the bright, clear light of the Summer sun. She need not feel too humiliated.

headline.main: Experts Devise a Program With Due Regard for Comfort and Health

docs.lead_paragraph: "HOW is school going?" we ask a child, unable to think of anything else to say. "All right," he answers, disposing of the topic and leaving us wondering what to say next. Questions form the adult's usual opening in conversing with the young, as Dr. May Reynolds Sherwin said in addressing a group of social workers recently at their Atlantic City conference.

headline.main: TALKING TO THE CHILD; PARENT AND CHILD
